hero.title: Rahul Beniwal
hero.subtitle: Software Developer II
hero.summary: Results-driven backend engineer with deep expertise in Python, Django, and Docker. Builds and deploys scalable, configuration-driven web apps via robust CI/CD pipelines, consistently delivering efficient and reliable solutions.

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer II
highlights: Built and customized a Keycloak-based auth microservice with SSO and fine-grained RBAC.
Implemented OAuth 2.0 sync for agent data, ending manual onboarding with Cloze.
Integrated Howard Hanna, LendingPad, Windermere, plus full Verizon rollout.
Shipped reporting suite: 20+ charts, 30+ graphs, 20+ exportable reports.
Cut DB latency from 3 min to 3 sec via smart indexing and caching.
Doubled Django ORM speed with a reusable caching utility.
Connected Regal, Iterable, Verse, and IBEX for event-driven engagement boosts.

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Designed and implemented a JSON-configured secure proxy system for API interactions
Implemented an independent payment management service (Still being used)

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer Intern
highlights: Developed client-facing APIs for business loan dashboards
Created scheduled jobs to synchronize systems
